H2.text: who sings only love can break your heart. Bob Dylan

H3.text: who sings only love can break your heart. Neil Young

A4.text: Only Love Can Break Your Heart is a song written by Canadian-American singer-songwriter Neil Young.

A5.text: The song is the third track on Neil Young's album After the Gold Rush.
